item.title: Culture returns to the Idiots’ Lantern
item.author: Ryan Ehlers,
item.description: I am culture,” declares a delusional and ranting Stewart Lee in the final episode of the new series of Comedy Vehicle, 30 minute episodes of stand-up comedy. He lists some admittedly impeccable credentials: books published by Faber and Faber(1) (“not Tesco’s own brand”), having co-written and …
